taskDescription:
Take ten minutes to think about (or discuss with your peers) the contexts in which you encounter translations and especially machine translations in your day-to-day life.

Do you know whether the books or articles you read are translated or not?

What about movies, TV or videos that you watch?

If they are translated, do you know how? Is machine translation involved?

Do you have a translation app on your phone? Do you ever translate webpages? etc. In these cases, do you know what machine translation system is being used?

How ubiquitous do you think translation really is? How ubiquitous do you think machine translation is?
